title: Joy In Your Garden
description: With easy-to-learn tips and advice from experts Joy Bossi and Karen Bastow, Joy in Your A Seasonal Guide to Gardening will have you gardening in no time! Novice gardeners or natural green thumbs will enjoy the success of gardening in any season of the year. The expertise and wisdom provided in this book will help you master the art of gardening, from using the correct tools for your garden to choosing a ripe watermelon. With beautiful photographs and helpful sketches, this book is sure to please the gardener in your family!
author: Joy Bossi
